thread.title: DEBBIE

author: DEBBIE
title: DEBBIE
text: Price on dress excellent - quality of dress great - sizing was great - shipping was fast- one very happy 13 yr old - for upcoming grad 8 grad . As a single mom i will shop here again price was unbelievable and i thought it was very appropriate dress for grad 8 grad, and once i ordered it less than a week to get it. Thanks promgirl. We will shop again at promgirl. Debbie and Arianah.
